meaning_str.bing:
n. 事件；事情；风流韵事；公共事务
网络. 绯闻；私通；恋爱事件

事件；事情；风流韵事；公共事务

事件；事情；事务；公共事务；政治事务；商务活动；私事；私人业务；个人的事；风流韵事；外遇；私通；不寻常之物

1.en: The affair has put a spotlight on Mr Cameron's circle of friends and his judgement, but so far calls for his resignation are not widespread.
1.cn: 此次窃听丑闻曝光了卡梅伦的朋友圈和他的判断能力。但到目前为止，要求他辞职的呼声并不普遍。

2.en: Having found out that his wife had an affair with another man, the poor man wanted to kill himself.
2.cn: 那个可怜的男人由于发现他的妻子与另一个男子有私情而想自杀。

3.en: She indicated no curiosity in the woman who had carried on an affair with her husband for more than a year and then murdered him.
3.cn: 她显得对这个跟她丈夫有过一年多风流韵事后谋杀了他的女人没有任何好奇。

0.en: He's having an affair. He is not having an affair.
0.cn: 他有外遇了。他才不是有外遇呢。

1.en: We think Chandler might be having an affair. What?
1.cn: 好，我想钱德可能有外遇了什么？

2.en: Well, that makes it too much of an Illinois affair.
2.cn: 但在伊利诺伊州竞选这样有些过了吧。

3.en: That's the only truly remarkable aspect of the entire affair.
3.cn: 这是整个过程中最非凡的部分。

4.en: And you, you're the one having the affair with the guy who keeps the pigeons on the roof. Phoebe. Secret affair.
4.cn: 你跟在屋顶上养鸽子的男人有一腿。菲比。那是秘密。

5.en: Well, I'm afraid my life is an altogether rougher affair. Consider me warned.
5.cn: 那我的生活要糙多了。我知道了。

6.en: Phoebe and Rachel saw you with Nancy today. And they think you're having an affair.
6.cn: 菲比和瑞秋今天看见你和南茜在一起，他们以为你和她有一腿。

7.en: They pinned everything on Gatsby. The affair with Myrtle. The hit-and-run. Everything.
7.cn: 他们把责任都推到盖茨比头上，与桃金娘的私情，肇事逃逸，所有的一切。

8.en: Before Perfect, Inc., football was a wild and unpredictable affair. I've changed that.
8.cn: 在完美工厂诞生以前，足球还是既狂野又变幻莫测的运动，但是我改变了这一切。

9.en: How's it going with the long distance love affair? Not easy, but we're making it work.
9.cn: 你那跨国异地恋怎么样啦？不容易啊，但我俩正在努力。

10.en: I'm not having an affair. Nancy is our realtor. I knew he couldn't be with a woman for 45 minutes!
10.cn: 我没有外遇，南茜是我们的房地产经纪。我就知道他不可能跟一个女人做45分钟那么长。

11.en: And anyway, there is something to be said about moving through it and focusing on us and not on the affair.
11.cn: 而且，不管如何，总有说，能熬过这一切的。只要多把关注点放到我们自己身上，而且不是出轨这件事上

12.en: It did not work, because at that time, people think, the trade affair and online are converse to each other.
12.cn: 但这也没有成功，因为当时人们觉得在线交易和贸易展会是互相冲突的。

13.en: Because I'm married. That's right, I am a married woman. And I came to a TV star's apartment to have an affair.
13.cn: 因为我已经结婚了，没错，我是有夫之妇，还跑到一个电视明星家搞外遇。

14.en: Why are you taking this so seriously? It's just a marriage. Besides, if I cheat on him, I can call it an affair.
14.cn: 你为什么那么认真？这只是婚姻而已，而且如果我背着他偷人，我可以说那是外遇。

15.en: And you're gonna give that up in the hopes that your husband will stop having an affair? I don't see how that adds up.
15.cn: 而你却要放弃它，就为了希望你的丈夫能够不再出轨，我不明白这怎么能持平呢？

16.en: You have sex with Tina from Payables. Hey, listen to me, Andy. You had an affair.You don't get it. Well, then help me out.
16.cn: 你会想和那个会计部的蒂娜上床。听我说，安迪。你有外遇了。你不明白。那你解释一下。

17.en: You don't say anything. Why would I say anything? That two of our best friends could start the greatest love affair of their lives.
17.cn: 什么都别说。我为什么要说？我们的两个好朋友要真正地谈恋爱？

18.en: And so, we must go back in time and across the ocean, because my love affair with these beautiful towers did not begin in New York.
18.cn: 因此我们得回到过去，跨越大洋，因为我与这些美丽高塔的爱恋不是从纽约开始。

19.en: Well, it's a shame that you'll miss the movie because we were gonna see, you know, either Liar Liar or Betrayal or An Affair to Remember.
19.cn: 太可惜了你不能去看电影。因为我们打算看《骗子，骗子》《背叛》或者是《不了情》。
